title: Cosmic Queries: Gravity, the Movie
description: How scientifically accurate was the movie, Gravity? Neil deGrasse Tyson and Chuck Nice answer your questions with a little help from NASA astronaut Mike Massimino.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
